group.name: What is the MIDI block?
group.note: The MIDI block currently gives you a component (the XMidiGenerator) to generate an XML representation from any MIDI file (called XMidi by its author Peter Loeb). There is also a component (the XMidiSerializer) to render XMidi back as a MIDI file. In due course I will add some transformers to perform basic musical manipulations such as transposition, inversion and retrograde. Hopefully I shall also add some transformers to generate SVG visualisations of the XMidi, starting with normal western musical notation.
